channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache -- Apache Tapestry
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache -- Apache Tapestry

item.title: CVE-2019-0207|2024-08-04T17:44:15.383Z -- apache -- apache%20tapestry
item.description: Tapestry processes assets `/assets/ctx` using classes chain `StaticFilesFilter -> AssetDispatcher -> ContextResource`, which doesn't filter the character `\`, so attacker can perform a path traversal attack to read any files on Windows platform.
